Class IsoBufferWrapperImpl

All Implemented Interfaces:
IsoBufferWrapper
public class IsoBufferWrapperImpl
extends AbstractIsoBufferWrapper

A FilterInputStream enriched with helper methods to ease writing of Iso specific numbers and strings.
